the man shuddered , torchlight rippling like lightning through his hair . " Much has changed since last I woke . I am called Londhar . why have you called me from the fire dreams ? "神秘人颤栗着，火把的光芒像闪电一样流过他的头发。“从我上次醒来到现在已经变了很多。我叫Londhar。你为什么把我从火之梦中唤醒？”

entry.def: If you do something by torchlight, you do it using the light that is produced by a torch or torches.
